name: Rescue With Trampoline
description:
Made with bit late.

OMG lot of people falling from the sky, what happened? Try to save them use Trampoline, its soft and can make they all life

Move: (A ,D)  Or  (Left,Right)

Jump : Space

Shoot: (Left - Left Mouse) And (Right-Right Mouse)

Sprint: Shift

Sorry the source code is a mess (First try godot with c#), but if you are still curious please click the link below.
